subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Bill Haas, son of the PGA Tour player Jay Haas, made a short birdie putt on the 18th hole to earn his first tour victory at the Bob Hope Classic on Monday.
snippet: Bill Haas, son of the PGA Tour player Jay Haas, made a short birdie putt on the 18th hole to earn his first tour victory at the Bob Hope Classic on Monday.
